Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Amulet
Description: A small bronze amulet in the form of a standing jackal. The animal stands on a base and has a loop at the shoulder for suspension.Such an animal may also represent the god Wepwawet, without a distinguishing colour it is difficult to definately attribute this type of amulet to Anubis alone.
